did.unittitle: Xavier University Department of Music and Theatre records
did.abstract: This small collection of theater-related materials includes minutes, correspondence and reports from 1982 to 1988.

bioghist.head: History of Xavier University Department of Music and Theatre
bioghist.p: Xavier University acquired a Department of Theatre Arts in 1980 when it purchased Edgecliff College. However, this department and its degree program were discontinued in 1988. In July, 2012, the Department of Music became the Department of Music and Theatre and introduced two new degree programs, a Bachelor of Arts in Theatre and a Bachelor of Science in Theatre education. In January, 2015, the Department of Music and Theatre became a part of the new School of Arts and Innovation in the College of Arts and Sciences.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This is a small collection of theater-related materials from 1982 to 1988.

arrangement.head: Statement of Arrangement
